name: Sergei Rachmaninov
notableWorks: Rhapsody on a Theme of Paganini
biography: Sergei Rachmaninov was a Russian composer, virtuoso pianist, and conductor of the late Romantic period. His works are among the most popular in the romantic repertoire. Rachmaninov's style is characterized by its expressive melody, rich orchestral colors, and use of lush harmonies.
